features: Suitable for small areas：The broom adopts PET bristles,which are flexible and flat, easy to clean the narrow space. such as windows, wall corners, kitchens, etc. small broom and dustpan set is compact and convenient, and has strong cleaning ability.

Promote parent-child relationship：When using the toddler cleaning set, it can not only improve the hands-on ability, but also enhance the parent-child relationship.Let the children entering the imitation stage learn cleaning skills and let the kid learn to help their parents.

Size：Tiny kid broom size:20.5 x 5.9in;dustpan:15.5 x 6.2 x 4.7in,users of this cute broom Mainly for children, the size design is in line with the child's body shape and is relatively small. It is great tool to start early teaching cleanup skills!

Design：The design of the slot, the small broom can be stuck on the handle of the kids broom set for toddlers when it is not in use, so it does not take up any space. It is also very good to give kid dustpan as a gift to children.

Note: This product is transported in a detachable way. If the children's dustpan you received is lack of parts or the dustpan brissels bent, please contact DGiant Dragon in time, and we will give you a satisfactory reply at the first time. Please pay attention to safety when assembling the children's broom. Tape can be added on the top of the handle to reduce the sharpness.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Providing quality products and services to our customers is our vision. Childhood is a critical period for children to imitate and learn. When parents clean, asking their children to help clean can not only improve their children's practical ability, but also enhance the parent-child relationship.

Children can easily use The total length of broom set is: 19.6 in, please pay attention to whether the size meets your expectations when purchasing. In addition, If you receive missing fittings or a dustpan with bent bristles, please contact DGiant Dragon in time, and we will give you a satisfactory reply at the first time

Small sets for big use Kids broom set is specially designed for hardworking children. Let the children entering the imitation stage learn cleaning skills and let the baby learn to help their parents. The small broom and dustpan set is also suitable for simple cleaning, such as small areas such as table, desk, keyboard, cabinet, closet, sofa and so on.The separate assembly design is convenient for daily life. Broom and dustpan set is not only an enlightenment tool for cultivating children's hands-on ability, but also can be used in daily life;

Product detail description Press and hold the broom head and turn the handle clockwise to tighten. (Note: the handle end is sharp when assembling the brush, so be sure to pay attention to safety during assembly.) Align the handle with the tail of the handle and press firmly to complete the installation.(Note: The toddler broom set is transported by disassembly. Please assemble the brush after receiving the goods.) Note: This product is transported in a detachable way. If the children's dustpan you received is lack of parts or the dustpan brissels bent, please contact DGiant Dragon in time, and we will give you a satisfactory reply at the first time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Loved this set. My son has tossed this all around the house and it hasn’t broken yet. It’s been 3 months strong. I love the mint green color as well. Nobody ever has this color unless it’s for a wedding.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Be careful of the stick
reviews.reviewText: It's smaller than I thought but it's for a child so it's ok. While assembling the broom together, I put my hand at the end of the stick to screw in the brush part. That side has an opening and I didn't know the edges are sharp enough to give me a gnarly cut on my finger. I'm glad it was me rather than my child, and also glad we had a stone sharpener to dull down the edges. Apparently it was the side is where the handle of the broom is suppose to cover. Just make sure that handle doesn't come off the stick and cause an accident.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Used this broom for my great grandchild to learn to sweep and learn to use her fine motor skills sweeping Pom poms

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The bristles were all bent in different directions so it wasn’t usable. He still liked it but I was disappointed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy for a toddler to use. The height of the broom is great for a toddler. Seems sturdy. Good value for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is not safe for toddlers!!! It arrived and I only received the dustpan and the bottom part of the broom with no cap for the sharp metal rod piece. It is less than a foot tall and sharp!! Do not buy! I thought it would be plastic. I thought it would be at least 2 feet tall. You are just buying a small metal rod with a broom attachment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My grandson Braxton loves it! it’s a perfect size for a 15 month oldHe loves it!
reviews.reviewText: It was a gift for my grandson and the live in Tennessee.
